name: Duck Mom
description:
In Duck Mom, You have to guide your baby ducklings to the nest, you can tell them to move and stop whenever you want.

Controls:

WASD/ArrowKeys -to move duck

Space -   to jump and double jump

C OR V -to tell the ducklings to  move Or stop , Ducklings will move in the direction you are facing.

-Duckling can jump on top of you to get to higher platforms.
